name: Inuk
description:
Inuk - Puzzle Game made during Blackthornprod Game Jam 2021 Description

Inuk is a simple puzzle experience. In order to finish levels you need to figure out how to move in the room and how to move ice blocks in order to make your way out.

How does it fit the theme

This game jam's theme is : Less is more.

By designing a game with simple mechanics and short play time, I emphasized more on creating a gameplay that works and assets that gives a particular mood to the game.

Credits

The code, assets and sound effects where made by me.

Music was made by Komiku : https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Komiku
